name: One Hour One Life
summary: A multiplayer survival game of parenting and civilization building. Get born to another player as your mother. Live an entire life in one hour. Have babies of your own in the form of other players. Leave a legacy for the next generation as you help to rebuild civilization from scratch.
info:
• 中文名: 一小时人生
  • 别名: 一小时一生
  • 别名: 一生一小时
